definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: son of Bethuel, brother of Rebekah, and father-in-law of Jacob (LXX Laban), Ge 24:29, Ge 24:29, Ge 24:50, Ge 27:43, Ge 28:2, Ge 28:5 + 17 t. J (Ge 29, Ge 30, Ge 31, Ge 32); Ge 29:15, Ge 29:16, Ge 29:19, Ge 29:21, Ge 29:22, Ge 29:26 + 18 t. E (Ge 31, Ge 32, [[הָאֲרַמִּי]] ´[[ל]] Ge 31:24); Ge 25:20 ([[הָאֲרַמִּי]] ´[[ל]]) Ge 28:5 (id.), also Ge 28:2, Ge 29:24, Ge 29:29, Ge 46:18, Ge 46:25 (all P).
